settings.heading: How is Kuona different from a traditional optometry practice?
settings.liquid:
KUONA, a boutique optometry clinic and optical store, located at the base of one of New York City’s most iconic hotels, The Beekman. Founded by Dr. Sophia Visanji, KUONA introduces a groundbreaking concept in eyewear, where expert eye care meets the warmth and elegance of luxury hospitality.
The space has been intentionally designed by Ringo Studio with warm tones and thoughtful mid-century modern details, creating a seamless connection with the Beekman’s welcoming atmosphere. KUONA is about more than just vision. It’s a new way to experience eyecare - combining health, beauty, and conierge service in one space.

settings.heading: What does Kuona mean?
settings.liquid: The brand name, KUONA, means “to see” in Swahili - an homage to Dr. Visanji’s family, who left East Africa as refugees exactly 50 years ago this year. KUONA reflects the power of the immigrant dream. It’s a new vision in an industry that has been stagnant for far too long.

settings.heading: Do you take insurance?
settings.liquid: Of course! We take both vision and medical insurances including VSP, Eyemed, United Healthcare, BCBS, Cigna and …

settings.heading: Do you accept Flexible Spending Accounts (FSA) or Health Spending Accounts (HSA)?
settings.liquid: Yes, we accept both FSA and HSA plans and encourage you to use it before you lose it! Use them towards new specs to elevate your look, prescription sunglasses (you can never have too many), readers, contact lenses or exam fees, including our specialty dry eye treatments that will have you refreshed and rejuvenated.

settings.heading: What if I have no insurance?
Which payment methods do you accept?
settings.liquid: Visa, Mastercard, Discover, American Express, Cash.

settings.heading: How often should I be getting an eye exam?
What if I don’t have any vision issues? Do I still need to get my eyes checked?
settings.liquid: Absolutely! Clear vision is only one part of ensuring your eyes are healthy.

settings.heading: What dry eye/aesthetic treatments does Kuona offer?
